-- | WAI adapter for Nero server applications
--   
--   Check the <a>README</a> for a more detailed explanation.
@package nero-wai
@version 0.3

module Nero.Wai

-- | Adapt a <tt>Nero</tt> <a>Application</a> to a <tt>WAI</tt>
--   <a>Application</a>.
waify :: Application -> Application
